Html: I want to add the capability to zoom on the map when double-clicked (it is for a tablet). I got the map to zoom on double click but the map doesn't zoom where clicked, it zooms on center. Basically I am doing gmap.Zoom+=1 when double clicked on the map. I want the map to zoom where clicked. How to do it? Ty
check map.MouseWheelZoomType, its for event void OnMouseWheel(MouseEventArgs e), but it's possible to adapt its logic for clicks
